title: CONTAINMENT BREACH: ORCHESTRAL HORROR MUSIC
description: 200MB+ of AAA Quality, Highly Customizable Orchestral Music Loops & Stingers!
longDescription:
Containment Breach: Orchestral Horror Music is a small ambient-orchestral music pack, meticulously crafted for use in survival-horror or any horror games! This pack features pieces recorded with the best sample libraries on the market, bringing you that AAA music quality at an unbeatable price. The main music tracks of this asset pack are also split into individual “layers”, to provide you with extra flexibility and customization!


Containment Breach: Orchestral Horror Music - Full Soundcloud Preview


For full package details/documentation (track tempo, meter, etc.), please visit this page. *This documentation is also included in your download.


~This pack is also included in JOURNEY ACROSS WORLDS: ACTION + ADVENTURE, the entire collection of music assets I've created~
